start: ^Hey Georgie! Could I get an iced americano with cream?
^Of course! Switching up your order a bit today I see!

c-0: ^You're right, I usually always get it black but I wanted to try something new.
g-0: ^I wanted to update you... my audition went really well! The label gave me an offer!
^Oh my gosh, that's amazing! You really manifested that!
^I've never heard of anyone getting signed to a label so quickly.

c-2: ^I can't believe my dreams are finally becoming a reality.
c-3: ^I can't believe it myself. I guess I managed to impress them!

g-1: ^Enough about me... how have things been going for you?
^I'm trying my best to run this shop, but it's all so new. My dream for years was to own a place like this, but now that I'm doing it I'm scared to mess it up.

c-4: ^I know you're going to do great. Since I came in for the first time, I can see that business is really picking up!

g-2: ^What made you dream of running a coffee shop?

^Honestly it's been a goal of mine for a really long time. My aunt owned a coffee shop back in the day in my hometown, and it helped me meet so many incredible people. I wanted to make a place for people in the city to feel that kind of community.

c-6: ^That's so sweet! You're right, it can get hard to meet friends in such a huge place like this city.

g-3: ^I'll see you soon, Georgie! Thanks for the coffee, it's sooo good here.
^I'm happy to hear that, I want to make the best quality coffee that I can.
